issue.title: Mass properties for the Atlas Unplugged v4 SDF are way off

content.raw: @hsu @scpeters @BillBlank disregard, I was under the impression that those changes were already part of the default release provided by the Ubuntu drcsim package. I'm just using the files in the pull request for now, seeing a mass of 174 kg.  Sorry about that.
content.html: @hsu @scpeters @BillBlank disregard, I was under the impression that those changes were already part of the default release provided by the Ubuntu drcsim package. I'm just using the files in the pull request for now, seeing a mass of 174 kg. Sorry about that.
